name: Ghost Machete
description:
I had no idea what to create for this "Freaky Friday" themed game jam, but I really wanted to submit something, just as programming practice for myself.

I went into the discord to say that I couldn't come up with anything, a user chimed in and said: "Make a game about something like a ghost machete."

I took that and ran with it, this is what I came up with. Enjoy :)

My discord username: TheBossMan5000#8235

Notes - 

Forced 1080p, I didn't have time to scale for other resolutions.

The loading screen hangs for a bit on my system, but it'll get there, just wait it out.

There is an "end scenario". If you can find the specific spot in the woods without getting killed by the ghost machetes, you can save the ghost girl and win.
